title: 2021 Survey Results
content:
[[module CSS]]
.collapsible-block-folded, .collapsible-block-unfolded-link { text-align: center; }
.collapsible-block-link{font-weight: bold;}

#page-content h2 {
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 1.65em;
    padding-bottom: 0.1em;
    border-bottom: solid 0.075em currentColor;
    margin-bottom: 0.875em;
}
table.wiki-content-table { width: 36rem; }
[[/module]]

[[div class="footer-wikiwalk-nav"]]
= << [[[2018-survey-results|2018]]] | [[[2019-survey-results|2019]]] | [[[2020-survey-results|2020]]] | ##blue|2021##| [[[2022-survey-results|2022]]] >>
[[/div]]

------

Welcome to the official SCP Foundation Wiki 2021 Community Survey results!

[[toc]]

++ Demographic Information
[[collapsible show="[+] SHOW RESPONSES [+]" hide="[-] HIDE [-]"]]

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/2021-survey-results/How%20old%20are%20you.svg]]
@@ @@
How old are you?
||~ Response ||~ # of Responses ||~ % ||~ % of Last Year ||
|| 15-19 || 2300 || [[span style="color: red;"]] 45.97% [[/span]]||49.04% ||
|| 20-29 || 1192 || 23.83% ||N/A ||
|| 30-39 || 205 || 4.1% ||N/A ||

++ Staff Initiative Responses
[[collapsible show="[+] SHOW RESPONSES [+]" hide="[-] HIDE [-]"]]
The staff team have been trying to promote the interconnectedness of works on the wiki. Do you feel you have found more or less new content linked within articles while reading through the wiki?
||~ Response ||~ # of Responses ||~ % ||~ % of Last Year ||
|| 1.0 || 65 || [[span style="color: red;"]] 1.34% [[/span]]||1.46% ||
|| 2.0 || 214 || [[span style="color: red;"]] 4.43% [[/span]]||4.84% ||
|| 3.0 || 1482 || [[span style="color: red;"]] 30.65% [[/span]]||31.27% ||
|| 4.0 || 1965 || [[span style="color: red;"]] 40.63% [[/span]]||41.49% ||
|| 5.0 || 1110 || [[span style="color: green;"]] 22.95% [[/span]]||20.94% ||
|| Did not respond || 167 || [[span style="color: red;"]] 3.45% [[/span]]||3.53% ||

[[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/2021-survey-results/Do%20you%20feel%20you%20have%20found%20more%20or%20less%20new%20content%20linked%20within%20articles%20while%20reading%20through%20the%20wiki.svg]] [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/2021-survey-results/Do%20you%20feel%20navigating%20the%20site%20is%20easier%20than%20it%20was%20before.svg]]

@@ @@

Recent navigation changes have been implemented on the wiki, such as the links on the topbar and sidebar. Do you feel navigating the site is easier than it was before?
||~ Response ||~ # of Responses ||~ % ||
||1.0||110||2.20%||
||2.0||333||6.66%||
||3.0||1446||28.90%||
||4.0||1618||32.34%||
||5.0||1302||26.02%||
|| ||194||3.88%||

[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/2021-survey-results/How%20do%20you%20feel%20about%20the%20featured%20articles%20on%20average.svg]]

++ Open-ended questions
We have considered your concerns about the open-ended questions and will be incorporating what we can into future surveys. Future editions of the community survey will contain assessments of accessibility, ease of writing for the site, staff opinions, and demographics, pending approval and review. We will be hosting additional surveys throughout the year as follow-ups and to provide more timely responses to your concerns. Many of the open-ended questions received were similar to comments addressed in [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/forum/t-15076841/suggestions-and-complaints-all-comments the recent suggestions and complaints survey.]

We intend on hosting the next survey towards the end of the year. Stay tuned.
author: LORDXVNV
